thread.title: Abbey Clancy flaunts incredible toned body in tiny white bikini during sun soaked trip
thread.title_full: Abbey Clancy flaunts incredible toned body in tiny white bikini during sun soaked trip

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Abbey Clancy flaunts incredible toned body in tiny white bikini during sun soaked trip
text:
Abbey Clancy flaunts incredible toned body in tiny white bikini during sun soaked trip The star showcased her flat abs and long legs in the revealing swimsuit Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
Abbey Clancy showed off her incredible figure as she relaxed in the warm weather during a holiday to Dubai. 
The long legged model put her famous body on display in a tiny white bikini while she enjoyed a late winter break abroad with daughters Sophia, five, and 20-month-old Liberty. 
The star was spotted at the luxury Le Royal Meridien hotel as she turned up the heat in the revealing two piece swimsuit which just barely covered her curves and left little to the imagination. Abbey put her figure on show (Photo: cliff-jkpix) 
Abbey has been spending some quality time with her girls, and she shared an adorable snap on Instagram with her followers. Read More
